body.p: The Wine development release 1.3.15 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Support for changing network passwords.
Reflection support in shader compiler.
Tests no longer attempt to cope with Win9x behavior.
A number of MSHTML and MSXML improvements.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
